posts.title: First post
paragraphs:
This is my first post on the blog.
The draft can be saved, you may comment and even search which posts you want to find.

posts.title: JSON
paragraphs: All of these posts/comments are stored in a json file

posts.title: Exam
paragraphs: I'm trying to finish this website very quickly so I can study for my exams as soon as possible.

posts.title: I'm about to turn this lab in
paragraphs: I'm about to go make the pull request and put this website on osiris.  I've been working on some other classes and tweaking this website just a bit.  It was a fun semester!
